Title: Ancient Sword
Description: Lex finds an old, rusted sword hidden among the rubble of an old temple
Effect: RNG to decide: Lex must return home to have the sword disenchanted by his Grandmother OR Lex leaves the sword and he receives 4 gold.

Title: Heavy Rain
Description: It is too dangerous to travel during a sudden rainstorm. Lex cannot switch to another land card until the end of the next Day Phase.
Effect: Lex cannot switch to another land card until the end of the next Day Phase.

Title: Food Poisoning
Description: Lex's stomach doesn't feel too great‚¶ Lex loses 3 points and cannot move to another terrain for the current day-phase.
Effect: Lex loses 3 point sand cannot switch to another land card for the current day-phase.

Title: Ravenous Hounds
Description: These hounds aren't too friendly! Reduce Lex's score by 2 and Lex discards two cards.

Title: The Cynocephali
Description: Lex meets some kind but awfully chatty dog-headed people. They insist on asking him of his travels
Effect: Depending on Lex's dice roll/RNG, he either receives 2 gold OR nothing happens.

Title: Swamp Hole
Description: Lex has been sucked into a rather clingy swamp hole‚¶ It doesn't want him to leave.
Effect: Lex can't leave the Swamp or make any discoveries for the rest of the current day-phase.

Title: Cave
Effect: When played, Lex must move to a Cave terrain.

Title: Forest
Effect: When played, Lex must move to a Forest terrain.

Title: Hills
Effect: When played, Lex must move to the Hills terrain

Title: Swamp
Effect: When played, Lex must move to a Swamp terrain.
